publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7734 Gil Paterson on behalf of the Standards, Procedures and Public Appointments Committee: Minor changes to Standing Orders—That the Parliament notes the Standards, Procedures and Public Appointments Committee’s 10th Report 2010 (Session 3), Minor changes to Standing Orders (SP Paper 552), and agrees that changes to Standing Orders set out in Annexe A to the report be made with effect from 1 April 2011. Supported by: Marilyn Livingstone*
